Posts.Title: Chemo starting next Tuesday

Posts.Content: Hi All Hope this isn't a daft question. But im starting on chemo next week and we live 1 1/2 hrs away from the hospital. How soon do the chemo effects kick in. Im am getting really stressed about the journey homeÂ  Thanks Anne
Posts.Title: Chemo starting next Tuesday

Posts.Content: HI I started mine last tuesday the 11th. Apart from feeling very slightly sick a bit tired on the frist 3 days and problems in the toilet area. I feel fine. Im now 8 days post 1st chemo and feel almost completly normal. My top tip take every med they give you even if you dont think you need it haha. Hope it all goes well for you Anne xx
Posts.Title: Starting chemo 26th

Posts.Content: HI Rusty Welcome to the group. Good luck with you surgery. Lets us know how you get on. I have only recently been diagnosed with Invasive lobular c and im having my mx on the the 2nd august.. Think we are both feeling about the about the same right now. Talk about mood swings im al over the place. Im hoping to be calmer once the mx is done and i know what the future will bring. tc anne
